alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 12:01AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jefferson, central Madison, southwestern Lowndes and southeastern Brooks Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1201 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Monticello, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Madison, Greenville, Aucilla, Cherry Lake, Hamburg, Pinetta, Lovett, Nankin, Empress, Clyattville, Blue Springs, Hanson, Ashville and Kinderlou. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
